phoneLibrary.communication

Class Call

  • java.lang.Object
    • phoneLibrary.communication.CommunicationObject
      • phoneLibrary.communication.Call
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<CommunicationObject>, XMLReadWritable

    public class Call
extends CommunicationObject
implements XMLReadWritable
    The Call class represents the call log in the phone.
    Author:
    Lee Ho Jun

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  Call.WrongSyntaxException
      This exception is thrown by Call object if failed to load data from the XML files.
